amendment.description: An amendment numbered 53 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to transfer $2 million from the Department of Justice general administration account towards Veterans Treatment Courts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
